files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.Net1414080903127GameActivity">
+    <RelativeLayout
+        android:layout_width="368dp"
+        android:layout_height="495dp"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="8dp"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteX="8dp">
+        <Button
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:id="@+id/rock"
+            android:text="石头"/>
+        <Button
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:id="@+id/scissors"
+            android:text="剪刀"
+            android:layout_toRightOf="@id/rock"/>
+        <Button
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:id="@+id/paper"
+            android:text="布"
+            android:layout_toRightOf="@id/scissors"/>
+        <Button
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:id="@+id/ascertain"
+            android:text="确定"
+            android:layout_below="@id/rock"/>
+    </RelativeLayout>
+
+</android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.Net1414080903127MainActivity">
+
+    <RelativeLayout
+        android:layout_width="368dp"
+        android:layout_height="495dp"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="8dp"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteX="8dp">
+        <Button
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:id="@+id/rank"
+            android:text="查看排名" />
+        <Button
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:id="@+id/start"
+            android:text="开始游戏"
+            android:layout_below="@id/rank"/>
+
+    </RelativeLayout>
+</android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.Net1414080903127RankActivity">
+
+        <RelativeLayout
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content">
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:id="@+id/ranking"
+                android:text="名次"
+                android:padding="20dp"/>
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_toRightOf="@id/ranking"
+                android:id="@+id/grade"
+                android:text="分数"
+                android:padding="20dp" />
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_below="@id/ranking"
+                android:id="@+id/first"
+                android:text="first"
+                android:padding="20dp"/>
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_toRightOf="@id/first"
+                android:layout_below="@id/grade"
+                android:id="@+id/firstGrade"
+                android:text="grade"
+                android:padding="20dp"/>
+        </RelativeLayout>
+
+
+
+</android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout>
+
